title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 450th Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 8/3/2020
content: Mayor’s Remarks:As many countries are facing the second or third wave of COVID-19 infections, the Central Epidemic Command Center and specialists believe that more cases may appear in Taiwan. Since major epidemic prevention measures were lifted on June 7, two months have passed. Tainan citizens have been criticized for wearing the masks the least often. Concerned bureaus should enhance the promotion of wearing facial masks, maintaining social distance, and other disease control measures.
